key_findings: predictions.csv contained stale Attempt 2 data; test_predictions.csv is authoritative
5-model ensemble caused severe overfitting (train-test gap 25.96pp vs 5.54pp in Att 2)
HCDA improved +3.95pp but at cost of DA -3.96pp (net negative)
Re-ranking had zero effect on test set
DA dropped below naive always-up baseline (53.30% vs 56.73%)
Model capacity increase (max_depth 2->3) was the wrong approach
improvement_plan: Revert to Attempt 2 architecture, add post-hoc isotonic regression calibration for HCDA
